title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin finally makes a decision on Daniel Jones' status as a franchise quarterback in the NFL after their loss to the Buccaneers on Monday night. He presents a surprising defense for Baker Mayfield as the QB struggles with injuries this season. He unveils his Herd Hierarchy after week 11 and has a surprising team in the top spot despite a loss. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show in studio to tell Colin if the Buccaneers are ready to contend for another Super Bowl title. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
